website_summaries.verdict: Environmentally friendly and makes an impact on your outdoor fire.
pros: Recycled glass pieces are transformed into fire pit accents that are functional and create a mood
The chestnut color lends to a soothing atmosphere
cons: Do not expect each recycled piece to be sized perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Looking - Well Made - Not Too Sharp
customer_reviews.text: YES •clean looking •wasn't sharp •Bahama came with a nice variety of colors •is so much better than the lava rocks the fire pit came with •one may have been enough, I liked having more! If it helps--> We purchased two bags of these to go with: If this review was helpful, click the "thumbs up"! I'm trying to get better about "giving back" to this ordering & deciding process :O)
customer_reviews.author: Meg & Will

customer_reviews.title: Does not withstand flames.
customer_reviews.text: The fire glass that was exposed to direct flame in the propane fire pit immediately turned black.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I’m giving this one star is, well it’s the lowest you can go but also I would give it one star because the color was pretty. Other than that, what a complete waste of money! The rock is so tiny and most of it is almost powder. When mixed with my other fire pit glass, it fell to the bottom so I can’t see any of the color anyhow. Largest pieces are maybe a quarter of an inch, which is pretty much useless. Save your money and buy from other sellers that have the size listed and actually arrive in that size.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: May need two boxes
customer_reviews.text: These glass pieces are a great replacement for the lava rocks. I had to order two 10lb boxes for my fire table (inner dimensions are 16.25in length, 16.25in width and 1.25in depth). Only had to use maybe half of the second box to get that full look. Really like how the flames appear like they are coming out from underneath the rocks. I recommend this product but just beware you may need to order two boxes for that full look depending on the size of your fire table.
customer_reviews.author: Shea B.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two bags for my gas fire pit. First ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two bags for my gas fire pit. First one had all large chunks. Second one had a lot of small pieces and shards. Make sure you empty the bag into a colander and then wash the pieces to clean the dust and small shards out
customer_reviews.author: gadetguy15

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors of glass
customer_reviews.text: I received these rocks last week and the first thing I did was wash them as many other reviewers recommended. I absolutely love the colors of this glass mix. It's beautiful, even my husband approves. I really like the large chunks. I only wish that 10lbs would have gone further. My fire pit still looks a bit "empty" gen after putting them all in and spreading them out.
customer_reviews.author: Suprmn001

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Will not buy again, all the rock around the fire ring burned and turned black. Ridiculous. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good colors but night enough blue glass
customer_reviews.text: Good colors but night enough blue glass. Much more clear glass. Also half bag filled with small broken pieces that's not big enough to use. Recommend picking out larger useable pieces and washing it before placing in fire pit. Don't pour entire bag in to pit, you will have fine glass pieces everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Collins

customer_reviews.title: Black glass looks excellent in fire pit table
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of the glass. I bought it for my fire pit table and I felt like one bag would be enough turns out it was since I kept the lava rock that came with the table as well. I went with the black glass since other reviewer’s commented that their glass turned a shade of black and I figured that this color went well with my table. I haven’t had much time to see how well they hold up, but so far it’s good. I did rinse the glass before I put it in the bowl. I would recommend doing this as there was a good bit of glass dust.
customer_reviews.author: mrchristopher2

customer_reviews.title: Solid Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Switching from volcanic rock to fire glass in our fire pit was a good decision. It's cleaner and the appearance of the fire on the glass is hypnotic. The 10 lb. bags arrived on time and ready to put into the fire pit. One recommendation I can make is when you get this product, wash it in simple water to wash off the dust on the glass. The clarity comes out and when the fire dances on the glass, it looks like the large clear pieces are melting.
customer_reviews.author: Spike C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color...flames appear to float above
customer_reviews.text: We bought the turquoise. They are beautiful. We have lava rocks under the glass for two reasons. Firstly, most manufacturers want lava rocks by the gas holes on the burner to allow for better airflow. Secondly, you don't need as much of the more expensive glass rocks. That said, at night they dance, sparkle and almost look like they are melting. Absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Khaki Stich

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome.  Real Improvement Over Lava Rock
customer_reviews.text: So some people had some gripes about these. Most were saying that the glass pieces were too small. I disagree. Most pieces in the bags were as big as my thumb (to the first knuckle). So no problem there. And the color is gorgeous. Really looks amazing with the fire pit on or off. The worst thing to me was how many bags it took for my pit. I put in 4. Whew. But no regrets now!
customer_reviews.author: JR Fent

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade, large chunks, quality
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Gave my propane firepit and upgrade from the lavarock that was included. Now with enough media to hide the burners and give a better coating of flame across the pit. Keep note these are large chunks of glass. They may fill your pit and prevent your cover from closing (if you have one) or make lighting the fire harder. No cracking or popping just like others who have commented.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Lew

customer_reviews.title: They look great, very happy
customer_reviews.text: They look great, very happy. i got 20 LB but needed to order another 10 LB to fill fire pit. Love the color have not tried with fire so hope they don't turn black. *update Have turned on fire pit several times no issue with them turning black, looks great
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Turquoise turns black as well.
customer_reviews.text: I saw reviews saying the glass turns black. I bought the turquoise color and it too turns black when coming in contact with the flame. Just like you would expect if you think about it. It's not as noticable on this color as it would be say, the clear ones. They still look nice, not all of the rocks touch the flame. It also looks better than the lava rock that came with my fire pit. As I am writing this review, they do not mention that the glass turns black, therefore I deducted one star.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Gas fire-pit glass rocks
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect them to be like broken glass rocks. Also the package size was a lot smaller then I had expected. I guess I didn’t look at the details before buying. After reading a few customers reviews of instructions on how to use them I followed suit; by soaking them in water for the dust and broken shards to wash off and then dry them. And then I slowly poured them onto my Highline gas firepit, in which they do seem to be able to withstand the heat. I’ve only found one slightly burned stone in the few weeks I’ve used them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Gross

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the turquoise fire glass and they turned black ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the turquoise fire glass and they turned black the first day I started the fire pit. It's just black around the ring where the flames comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Souvanh Vilaysinh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read all the other reviews about washing them before using. Really brought out the color. Also, don't flip the bag over and dump the rocks out or you will get all the chards at the bottom mixed in - makes for more cleanup that way.
customer_reviews.author: Seth P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 boxes of these in the blue, to use in our new fire pit. I followed the suggestion of some others on here and rinsed the rocks before using. We have used the fire pit several times and the rocks are still crystal clear and look new. The only thing I didn't like was the fire pit used 1 1/2 boxes of rocks. That was expected, again, after reading others reviews. However, what do I do with 1/2 a box of rocks????
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Contrast Against Flame
customer_reviews.text: Bought my mom a fire pit for her birthday. Her favorite color is blue so I got these too. She absolutely loves them. The glass under the flame is stunning. There are definitely enough in one order to fill the basin of the pit but I think I will buy a second to get an even better effect so that you can see the blue as a bit of a mound.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my new gas fire table and they look great. It came with the lava type rock, but there really wasn’t enough. I prefer the glass look and my husband likes the lava rock look ... So I just added these in and they look good together. They blend nicely. Very happy ... prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Ice Clear Fire Glass
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear stones. 10 lb bag filled it nicely, but left a few gaps. Ordered a second bag. After first fire, we noticed a little bit of yellowing but did not effect the overall color. After multiple fires we’ve not had any more discoloration. Yellowing occurred on about five stones. Still recommend. Edit: first photo with only one 10 lb bag; second photo to show it with the second 10 lb bag. It filled nicely without overfilling. Almost no glass dust or small shards in either bag.
customer_reviews.author: peaseofcake

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I ended up ordering 20 pounds based on other reviews but we only needed one (Kohl's free returns are awesome!!!) They are so pretty and nice big pieces. We got the aqua color. Our pit is 12x12 and about 3 inches deep
customer_reviews.author: Maleea Muhlestein

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but it melts. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what type of glass this is but it melts and makes a mess. When you try to remove the melted glass, it breaks and becomes razor sharp. I cut myself twice trying to remove the melted glass from the fire pit. Yes it looks good but it will ruin your fire pit when it melts. I would not recommend this unless you just want to put it there without fire.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dikmen

customer_reviews.title: Fire and water
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two bags of blue glass thinking it would be enough for my Firepit, but I was wrong. But, instead of purchasing another bag I left the lava rocks in the center. It turned out better than what I was expecting. Simply beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: STEMO

customer_reviews.title: Great Size Glass Rocks
customer_reviews.text: These glass rocks were great size and no small pieces at all. I did wash them prior to placing them into my fire pit. I was able to pick up the glass rocks with my bare hands and placed accordingly. These were one bag of 10lbs of blue and ice each. I purchased this fire pit from Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: No returns available.
customer_reviews.text: Love the rocks, but only product I’ve purchased through Amazon that simply does not allow/offer the ability to return. Maybe this can be resolved, but if not you better be sure to under buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Caster

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in gas firepit!
customer_reviews.text: Arrive promptly, looks as pictured. All good. We needed 30 lbs. The dimensions of the metal bowl in the gas firepit were approximately 19" D and approx. 2" deep. So if you are so inclined you now have enough information to calculate the volume of 10lbs I had originally purchased just 20 lbs, but that looked incomplete. 30 lbs fills it up nicely even after uncovering the square starter cover. Have fun - looking forward to many happy evenings around this. The glass reminds of the waters over the reef in Belize.
customer_reviews.author: tall traveller

customer_reviews.title: Wrong packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a lightning deal and received 3 bags. Out of the 3 bags only 1 was the correct color, the other 2 were labeled correctly but, not the right color.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not as small as I thought, but better than I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This aren't tiny so be aware of that. Maybe the size of your finger curled in a ball. These conduct heat nicely and have had no issues with crackling or such. Stylish look. If you have a large firepit, you'll need to order a good amount. I didn't need a lot since I just required some replacement fireglass, but you'll probably have to order several bags to fill a pit entirely. Bad isn't that big so make sure you do your measurements or you'll have to make additional orders. Good quality fireglass
customer_reviews.author: Aku

customer_reviews.title: Like these a lot but could use a bit more material
customer_reviews.text: The rocks look very good with vibrant colors and angular shapes. In early use they seem to hold up very well. For our standard 30” fire table, the bag is filled about 5-10% less than desired. Our burner is slightly exposed and it looks a little under filled.
customer_reviews.author: 80s gamer

customer_reviews.title: Harsh chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Nice color but, once I put them in my fireplace and used it my house smells like chemicals and now I have a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rocks blew up when heated and had to go back ...
customer_reviews.text: Rocks blew up when heated and had to go back to the rocks that came with the fire pit. Very dangerous !
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T Stieg

customer_reviews.title: Rocks look great but time will tell about the  longevity
customer_reviews.text: Bahama blend comes with 3 colors light blue, blue, and clear. The size is just right 1/2 inch I think. We have had 4 fires and the rocks in contact with the flames are developing a white coating as pictured in the pic with 2 rocks the light blue color. If the white color doesn't get worse I'll come back and raise to 4 starts instead of 3.
customer_reviews.author: 9 fingers

customer_reviews.title: Glass burns when heat touchs it
customer_reviews.text: Put this into my new propane fire pit and after only an hour the glass started to turn black. Will be sending this back and will never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: beautiful when lit
customer_reviews.text: This glass is amazingly beautiful when lit, however for a table type fire pit, 10lbs wasn't nearly enough. It looks like it's going to need about 30lbs total to really fill out the top of the table type fire pit. The bummer is when I initially ordered it, I had no idea how much the fire pit would take so when I went back to order, the price I was able to find was $6 a bag more than I had initially paid. Maybe some kind of a guide for how much to buy for each style of firepit would be helpful to future orderers.
customer_reviews.author: tw

customer_reviews.title: good replacement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I wasn't impressed with the stones that came with the grill. I ordered two packages and discovered three were needed. Fortunately the shipping is quick. Just a word of caution, put something on top of the glass (after they sufficiently cool down) and the cover if you don't want to shred the cover. I ruined my first cover the first time it snowed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob_Trumbull

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot for the price but the quality wasn't what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return them as they cracked/split open after one night. Some how it left black spots on my glass screen protector as well. I have not been able to remove the stains. They started off as black but became some kind of gray color. Maybe in a big open fire pit it wouldn't be an issue, but because my fire pit is smaller and has a glass shield I was worried that the cracking would cause more damage.
customer_reviews.author: Stiletto Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: I like the presentation.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking rocks even though they do turn black. The three pictures were taken within 5 minutes of receiving the glass rocks. I will order again just because I like the effect and do not care that much that the blacken. My fire pit (Fire Dancer) had vermiculite before and I like the glass rocks 100% better. 2/19/2020 Update: On closer inspection the black is actually soot not the rocks turning black. I guess propane does not burn as clean as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Cripe

customer_reviews.title: happy about this item
customer_reviews.text: I bought bags of Bahama blend, pacific blend, turquoise & clear. these colors are true to what i saw on my screen. multiple sizes, so for me this was good as I will use them in different projects. I am very happy with this purchase! I got what I wanted in an amount that works for me!
customer_reviews.author: as

customer_reviews.title: Great glass with just a little work needed.
customer_reviews.text: This glass is awesome! I used it to fill my propane fire pit and it looks great. I've taken the different colors and made many designs. I only mark it at four stars due to the fact that I had to take time to clean/sift out the small dust particles. It took me two times of cleaning the glass to get it right. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Improves the look of a cheap tabletop fire pit
customer_reviews.text: I have a cheap table top propane heater. It had lava rock that was less than attractive. I replaced it with this glass. What a difference it made!! Looks much better! I did take advice from others and rinsed the glass before i placed it in the burner. I got a cheap strainer from the Dollar store and found that was a great help in removing the glass from the bucket of water. I placed it on cardboard to dry before putting in my little fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Rippe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to my fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with my purchase! After reading many of the review, both positive and negative, I decided to take a leap of faith and order a 10 pound bag. I have nothing negative to say about this product. I did wash the pieces upon arrival, however there was minimal dust in my bag. The one 10 pound bag filled my fire pit, although the lava rocks are still in there also. I was planning to exchange the lava for the glass, however my son got ahead of me and just added the glass to the lava. I have not had a problem with the glass turning black, and we have had a fire each night since my purchase arrived.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer beck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: These fire rocks are beautiful! The colors are great. I did mix in a little bit of cobalt blue reflective glass that I already had so if you see some in the pictures it’s not part of this bag but these colors are still beautiful by themselves and the pieces are big. The best part is the price...they’re so much cheaper than other fire glass I’ve seen on amazon but the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: CHEezyMom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color with thick glass
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 10lb bags of cobalt blue. They had a fine dust on them, as you can see in the photo, so I rinsed them off in a colander and let them dry on a towel. I used 1.5 bags for my 16x16 fire pit and they ended up being approximately 2 inches deep. They are a brighter blue during the day and at night with the flames they are a darker blue but you can still see the blue shimmer through.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Dagenhart

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glass. Great price. We needed 20 lbs to fill our fire table. Looks so much better than the lava rocks that came with the table. Took another reviewers advice and washed glass before adding to pit. We didn’t have any trouble with hlass turning black after fire. Very pleased with price, quality and color is beautiful .
customer_reviews.author: burghchick

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!!
customer_reviews.text: Our fire pit came with broken clear glass which looked cheap and messy. Chose these because I suspected they would make the fire look more like embers. We are very pleased with the effect and have been asked where we found it as the random shapes with rounded/tumbled edges is so different from the average broken pieces and/or buttons. Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT MATCH FOR MY OUTDOOR FURNITURE
customer_reviews.text: CUTE ROCKS. THE COLOR IS VIBRANT AND GORGEOUS. THE SIZE OF THE ROCKS ARE AS DESCRIBED. I BOUGHT 2 PACKS TO FILL UP MY FIRE PIT. AFTER BURNING EVERYDAY FOR TWO WEEKS, FOR ABOUT 6 HOURS AN EVENING, THE ROCKS BEGAN TO SHOW SOME DISCOLORATION. BUT I WASHED THEM AND THEY RETURNED TO THEIR BEAUTIFUL COLOR. I THINK IT'S A GOOD QUALITY PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Yashika

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reviewers complaining about small pieces and lack of color. I have to disagree. I didn’t dump the whole bag so there may be some dust at the bottom, but there are lots of large colorful chunks of glass. I’m using mine in the front of a gas log fireplace so minimal direct flame contact, but I haven’t had any turn black. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Look & an upgrade from lava rock.
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than the sparse lava rock my patio heater came with. The black is a deep amethyst & looks excellent. I needed two 10# bags to fill it properly. HINT: dump bag into a colander first to get rid of the messy small powder and rinse to clean the glass before drying and putting in your heater.
customer_reviews.author: Karri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fire Glass
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent fire glass for the money and looks really nice when fire is on during the day and night. I purchased two bags to fill my fire pit. The glass retains heat for additional warmth when fire is turned off. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: 3 mixed packs
customer_reviews.text: I used 3 packs of Ocean blue, turquoise, and cobalt. Loved the combination! 30 lbs is perfect amount for normal fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: B.a.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great and a good price. Keep in mind, these are a bit larger - maybe 1/2" to 5/8" on average - they aren't the small little pieces. I like them - they look great and handle my fire bowl without issue. I'd buy these again - wait, I did! I've bought this twice now - very happy both times.
customer_reviews.author: B and B

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: Look great so far. I have had them burning for a couple of hours and they have not turned black like some others said in their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Common Sense

customer_reviews.title: For show only don’t burn
customer_reviews.text: It’s good if u are using it for show only they turn black and melt together and also burst if they are cold and you turn the fire on make sure ur wire screen is closed a Piece hit me in my arm luckily it didn’t hit me in my eye it didn’t do any damage to my arm and didn’t cut me or anything
customer_reviews.author: Jerimy Urquide

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for fire glass
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after sticker shock set in at the blue hardware store. This is a much smaller sized package, and slightly cheaper by the pound than the other place. They look and perform great with no discoloring or ill effects. My advice for a fire pit or table: put down lava rocks, then a barrier, then a thin layer of fire glass. Saves cost to be sure. For a barrier, I recycled the metal curtain from a fireplace door set. Works great. Two small bags of lava rock, one metal curtain stretched out tight, then one bag of this fire glass filled my ~4” fire table perfectly with a cost of about $35.
customer_reviews.author: esta40

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Prrfect
customer_reviews.text: These can be awfully expensive for a decent amount and find in a color/mix that suits. This was just so ideal, and we didn’t have to go looking. I used them in an outdated propane fire pit. Two bags even left a little excess, but not much. Arrived fast and safe. Just a great buying experience!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Perfect size and the mix (Bahamian blue) is just beautiful. I added red. And kept some of the original copper.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn B

customer_reviews.title: Love them at this unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this glass. Very nice ambiance. I cleaned them before using by simply placing in a bucket of water. Once dried, I added them to the firepit. I did have a few that turned slightly darker but nothing that would discourage me from purchasing again. Out of two bags, maybe six turned darker.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Makes the fire mesmerizing.
customer_reviews.text: Brightens up the fire. The flames reflecting on the clear pieces of glass make them look like pieces of ice melting, which is mesmerizing.
customer_reviews.author: Forest Sickles

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to pit.
customer_reviews.text: So glad we added this glass to our propane fire pit. Adds a nice touch to our clear ice glass rocks. Came as stated in the amazon ad. Arrived on time. A nice addition to any propane fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: These are as pictured, although they should let you know, that it will take at least 20 lbs, to fill up an average fire-pit. I had to use the lava rock that came with the pit as a base and then filled up the top with the glass, one bag barely covered the top.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don't get these they explode under heat
customer_reviews.text: The colors were awesome but one big safety issue the rocks got hot in exploded and shot everywhere
customer_reviews.author: mike molter

customer_reviews.title: Color blue
customer_reviews.text: Love these glass rocks. I carefully scooped them out and into a bucket of water to remove any dust. I laid it on a towel to dry and then placed them in the pit. The shine is beautiful. Mesmerizing in fact.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD-GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Multi-bluish stones and some in a sort of purple with larger size has this item great for filling in vases and putting in the window for a truly nice sunlight projection on the far wall. we original got this to replace our fake, on the wall mounted fireplace logs, which is 'ok', but found the fireplace lights too low for a real good look. found the stones about 1-2" and some a bit smaller as VERY nice for the above final need. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SonomaRik

customer_reviews.title: TURNS BLACK
customer_reviews.text: Turned black within 1 minute of lighting it. I even gave them a good wash and plenty of dry time before using them. I dont recommend. However, fast shipping and they are pretty... UNTIL they turn black.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in a fire-really shines
customer_reviews.text: These look great in a fire pit. We purchased them for my in-laws as a gift. This was the color that they wanted. The price was a little higher than we would have liked to have spent, but they do a lot for us. They look great in a fire. The fire really makes them sparkle
customer_reviews.author: Dana Sab

customer_reviews.title: Glass starts melting and smoking.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this fake glass. It melted and started smoking. I'm sure that it would have started on fire.
customer_reviews.author: B. Meister

customer_reviews.title: Ambiance plus!
customer_reviews.text: Really looks much better than the black pebbles that came with the fire pit. I’m going to order another bag to fill up the entire pit to really light it up. I am also going to order some for my son who has a fire pit like mine.
customer_reviews.author: clark

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Three stars given due to it arriving less than inches advertised. They might as well have sent sand. Beautiful cobalt reflective color though most pieces were black. I ordered blue not black. Wish I didn't receive a bad batch. Quality control needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: All was good. Make sure u select the fire pit version. I got the blue and black. I had to replace the fire ring and replaced some of the lava rock with this. Yes some of the blue rocks turned slightly by he color but it’s because I have the fire ring has holes pointing down into the lava rock... but almost not noticeable. Love the product. Photos are on low gas settings.. I have this attached to my house has .. not a propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: Timo Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fire pit and They are beautiful. The way the fire dances off of both colors (but particularly the white/crystal pieces) is mesmerizing. It's like they are constantly melting and reforming. I made sure to wash them first so they shine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Hoffer

customer_reviews.title: Order more than you think
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a fireplace in my house. Colors and look are exactly what I wanted. Ordered 4 boxes and found it didn't cover the floor of my firebox. 2 more boxes still not enough to produce the mound of glass I want.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Saslawsky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We love these. What a great way to add the color to the fire pit and really make furniture look even better. Our out came with lava rocks, which was not the look we were going for. Prices excellent compared to any other option as well
customer_reviews.author: sw

customer_reviews.title: Clear glass is good
customer_reviews.text: Rinsed the glass in a sieve as some reviewers recommended. Haven’t had any issues with glass turning black or exploding. We bought the clear white glass. I need to order another bag though because there wasn’t enough.
customer_reviews.author: B Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great if you get consistent color on subsequent orders.
customer_reviews.text: I love the turquoise glass, on the left in the photo. I reordered it, and got the darker color on the right side of the photo. Not as happy with the darker color, but I had opened the package before realizing the color difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mytrainer

customer_reviews.title: nice product - good amount in package for a fire pit
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice assortment however I found it was pretty lacking on the amount of green glass in the package. It had substantially more blue in there. I can't say this is the same for every package because it may simply be an assortment issue. I put in in my new fire-pit and it looks great. I had hoped for slightly more green in there because our patio furniture cushions are green. Oh well, we will still enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the color
customer_reviews.text: These are not 'turquoise'. They are more regular blue. I didn't tear open the plastic wrap since I knew I would return them, but they appear to be a decent sized nuggets. Only sending them back because i don't like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta, GA Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: Color exactly like the picture. I like how the “jagged” style if glass looks when the fire is on. I was surprised at how small the box was. Ten pounds isn’t a lot of glass. We ended up having to buy a second 10 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mac

customer_reviews.title: Outland Firebowl 893 Deluxe meets Hiland Fire Glass
customer_reviews.text: I orderd two bags. Each bag was 10 lbs. It contains three colors, 70% Blue, 15% white & 15% green. Washed like other reviews recommend. I added them to the Outland Firebowl 893 Deluxe fire pit I purchased back in July. I removed some of the lava rocks then added the fire glass. Blue then the white glass and the green glass on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two ten pound bags. They appeared equal in quantity and quality. Gave them a quick rinse to remove dust and placed them in our gas fire pit. They look great, at least much better than lava rock. No qualms.
customer_reviews.author: foradrive

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this fire glass. The colors are perfect; bright and different blues. Works great in a fire pit. Had to buy 2 bags to fit a small fire pit. I did read the reviews before purchasing and took someone’s advice about rinsing them well before using therefore I did not have the black smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Kissefur

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in my gas fire table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in my gas fire table. Other reviewers have done a good job describing this item, but I wanted to say I agree and would buy this again without regret. Much prettier than the lava rocks that came with the table. I have a small table and ordered the 20 lbs bag. Filled it appropriately. No left over rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Nursecooksomm

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought 30 lb to use in my outdoor fireplace. I did not experience any blacking as others have stated, after using them for several days. I did not wash them I just took them straight out of the box and put them in my fireplace and it has been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Better value than others
customer_reviews.text: Looks like dragonglass. Needed to rinse off the dust before putting them in the pit. Overall great product. One bag would not have been enough to fill our pit, but they were able to cover the pebbles we had.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Looks gorgeous. Got sooty.
customer_reviews.text: The color of this is like a perfect pale blue green tinted glass. It doesn't seem iridescent like some do. I like it. Some of the pieces closest to the flame got blackened. Not sure if that will wash off. I'm going to try.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a LOT darker and red than pictured, I wonder if I even got the correct glass
customer_reviews.author: C75

customer_reviews.title: works great in fire table on porch
customer_reviews.text: works great in fire table on porch with 20# gas propane tank. don't see any "black" on the glass from the flames. looks so much better looking than the lava rock that came with our fire table.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Advertises colored stones chg color of fire. That's not case here. Lava rocks seem put out hotter fire than glass stones but stones look prettier even though colors still same.
customer_reviews.author: C. J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my new fire pit. I’m all about the green. I added them over my lava rock included with the fire pit which we’re covered perfectly. I don’t believe the one bag of glass would have been enough w/o using the lava rock as well. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Doesnt look like pic. And I was sent white stones initially. But works to give off heat
customer_reviews.author: Diama

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: They did turn a little black at first. But you just have to make sure there is still room for the air/flames to get through. As long as you don't pile them on too much on the ring they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jv

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!!
customer_reviews.text: The fire glass is great. I needed 20 pounds so I mixed these ones with a mix of blue and white. I rinsed them before I put them in the fire pit. These were half the price of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Catriona Sigsby

customer_reviews.title: Make your fireplace perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stones for a propane fireplace. After rinsing them off and drying them, I placed them on top of half of the lava stones that came with the fireplace. I have used the fire several times and notice no damage or discoloring of the stones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking fire rocks
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking rocks and are a good value for the money. I took off one star bc some of the rocks are turning a blackish color. But they do look really cool in our fire table
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mccann

customer_reviews.title: Far better than your standard lava rock
customer_reviews.text: An expensive option to your outdoor fire pit. With that being said I would highly recommend this glass over standard lava rock! Retains heat well aNd is beautiful to watch. Rince glass and allow to dry before use.
customer_reviews.author: Your Brother Man

customer_reviews.title: Great color and reflection
customer_reviews.text: These look great and really makes the firepit stand out. Only thing is price was a little high. The color is great and size is small pieces that reflects fire light really well and complements the stones.
customer_reviews.author: TOM V.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Chic
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something more than ordinary in your fireplace you should buy this product. My husband painted our fireplace in black and these glasses looks great when we turn on the fire. We are happy with our purchase and we bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: One of my best buys
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Replaced lava rock. When I started looking the prices for glass was very high, so I started to really shop and I found this. It looks great with the fire and I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful. This is my second bag. The first bag I did not rinse before using and a few turned black but the second bag was rinse and are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chas

product_meta.description: Color:Chestnut| Size:20 lb.| Style:Recycled Glass1/3-Inch Recycled Fire glass is a beautiful addition to your fireplace or fire pit. Fireplace Glass and Fire Pit Glass are growing in popularity as ceramic logs and lava rock are becoming a thing of the past. Adding one of our 12 colors of Fire glass to your decor will give your entertaining areas new life and a modern look. Flames dance and flicker on luminous jewel-like glass, turning your fireplace or fire pit into a unique piece of art. Fireplace Glass and Fire Pit Glass are formulated for long-term heat consumption. It will not melt or degrade, and will last virtually a lifetime.
feature_bullets: Fire glass is very easy to maintain because it emits no ash, soot, or smoke. Thus you can spend more time enjoying your fire pit/place and less time cleaning it
Our fire glass is not just exquisite to behold, it is also very practical. It does a wonderful job of covering the entire floor of a fire feature, effectively hiding the unseemly pipes and tubes
Heat Rating: Higher temperature when compared to logs, lava rocks, stones, etc.
Ideal for both indoor or outdoor environments, fire glass may be used in either natural gas or propane fires
